mapper.select: SELECT year FROM semester ORDER BY year DESC
SELECT dept_name AS departmentName FROM department

SELECT course_id, classroom, type, year, semester, time, title, credit, week_plan, text_book, goal, max_std, u.user_name, d.dept_name, grade FROM course c JOIN professor p ON c.user_id = p.user_id JOIN user u ON p.user_id = u.user_id JOIN department d ON p.dept_id = d.dept_id JOIN semester s ON s.semester_id = c.semester_id WHERE course_id = #{courseId}
